original_title: Solid States: Concrete in Architecture and Structural Engineering
overview: "Solid States: Concrete in Architecture and Structural Engineering" offers examples and insights into the ever-adapting possibilities of concrete. With the participation of prominent architects and engineers such as Steven Holl, Toshiko Mori and Bernard Tschumi, the lectures consist of footage and theories pertaining to the developments of concrete as a material within the architectural world.
title: Solid States: Concrete in Architecture and Structural Engineering
